text: UAllâh Akenzanga iintliziyo ezimbini ngaphathi endodeni. Kananjalo Akabenzanga (bangavumeleki) abafazi benu enithi ngoomama1 benu, abavumelekanga ngokusemthethweni ukuba babe ngabafazi benu. Kananjalo Akabenzanga (bangoonyana benu) oonyana2 enibanga ukuba ngabenu (kodwa ingengobenu koko bengoonyana enibamkele njengabenu). Oko kuyintetha nje yenu eniyitsho ngemilomo yenu, kodwa Yena uAllâh Uthetha inyaniso, yaye Ukhokelela eNdleleni (elungileyo)
